title: HTMX Example Schema
description: Schema for storing HTMX examples in a vector database for semantic search

title.description: Title of the example as shown on the page

category.description: Category of the example (e.g., 'UI Patterns', 'Dialog Examples', 'Advanced Examples')

description.description: Short description of what the example demonstrates

html_snippets.description: Array of HTML code snippets shown in the example

description.description: Description or explanation of the code snippet

javascript_snippets.description: Array of JavaScript code snippets shown in the example

description.description: Description or explanation of the code snippet

key_concepts.description: Key HTMX concepts demonstrated in this example

htmx_attributes.description: HTMX attributes used in this example (e.g., 'hx-get', 'hx-trigger', 'hx-swap')

full_content.description: The full textual content of the example page with HTML tags removed

demo_explanation.description: Explanation of how the demo works, extracted from the page

complexity_level.description: Subjective assessment of the example's complexity

use_cases.description: Common use cases where this pattern would be useful
